sentence: Mexican Immigrant Population in the U.S. in Decline
Source: For 1850to 1980: Gibson Campbell and Kay Jung "Historica Census Statistics on
the Foreign- Born Population Working ofthe United States: 1850-2000, U.S. Census Bureau,
Population Division, Working PaperNo 81 2006; for Mexican born 1980 and 1990:
Integrated Public Use Microdata Series (IPUMS-USA): for 2005 to 2012: Pew Research
Center estimates based on augmented American Community Surveys, for 1995-2000 and
2013-2014 Pew Research Center estimates based on augmented Surveys, March supplements to
the Current Population Survey and 2000 Decennial Census.
